archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0497
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to define the services a customer use if they have an active SIM card but no active plan, so I can configure the product how I like. (E.g. no plan can receive non chargeable calls and texts, and call free Vodafone services & emergency services)

properties.value: Details to be discussed. What is allowed to be configured and on which level. Rules need to be configured once and not expected to change often.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
